code: export const ADD_TODO="ADD_TODO";export const DELETE_TODO="DELETE_TODO";export const EDIT_TODO="EDIT_TODO";const addTodo=text=>({type:ADD_TODO,payload:{todo:text}});const deleteTodo=index=>({type:DELETE_TODO,payload:{index:index}});const editTodo=(index,text)=>({type:EDIT_TODO,payload:{index:index,text:text}});export{addTodo,deleteTodo,editTodo};
